argument.name: index_name
argument.description: The tag name of an index.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.INDEX_SETEXPLICIT() method sets the primary index for the layout. It displays error message if Index_Name is not found. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.Index_SetExplicit("Lastname1") ? ptr.Index_Name() = "Lastname1" ptr.Index_SetExplicit("Lastname2") ? ptr.Index_Name() = "Lastname2"
